original_text: When the three hundred trumpets sounded, the Lord caused the men throughout the camp to turn on each other with their swords. The army fled to Beth Shittah toward Zererah as far as the border of Abel Meholah near Tabbath.
korean_text: 삼백 명이 나팔을 불 때에 여호와께서 그 온 진영에서 친구끼리 칼로 치게 하시므로 적군이 도망하여 스레라의 벧 싯다에 이르고 또 답밧에 가까운 아벨므홀라의 경계에 이르렀으며

sentences.original_text: When the three hundred trumpets sounded
the Lord caused the men throughout the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 진영에 있는 모든 사람들로 하여금

sentences.original_text: to turn on each other with their swords
The army fled to Beth Shittah
as far as the border of Abel Meholah
